name: IndiaNet Consultants
tag_list: lawyers, law-firm, solicitor, attorney, legal-assistance, legal-advisor, legal-advice
description: Indianet is a IT consultants firm
overview:
Helplinelaw.com is one of the pioneers of legal services portals. It started work in 2000 and has provided the exemplary services initially to the Indian market and then moved onto international service of finding reliable lawyers in 217 countries since 2004.

Helplinelaw lays its emphasis on providing legal information and credible lawyer/ law firm references to the visitors in any part of the world it caters too.

All information available on this portal is in easy to understand language focused on citizens rather than lawyers.

We also make our utmost effort to ensure all lawyers and law firms are duly screened before they are listed with us.

We understand legal assistances are needed in nearly all spheres of our life and we have related services for: 1) Legally approved Real estate 2) Immigration 3) Legal research 4) Corporate advisory services and such niche services in all major areas of law.

List a Lawyer/ Law firm profile on helplinelaw.com with solicitors, attorneys and advocates advertising their practice areas. Sign-up for helplinelaw.com to register as a lawyer/ law firm and advertise your areas of practice. List your legal services on helplinelaw.com having lawyers and legal advisors as members from all over the world. Become a paid member or opt for a trial membership for a listing in any country. A vast worldwide network of lawyers and law firms for legal help and legal research. Find local practitioners around the world.

Divorce, custody, corporate, agreement, provident fund, Registered marriage, Court marriage, Special/ Foreign marriage, Incorporation of company, Rent, eviction, tenancy, lease, Labor laws, Appeals, Supreme Court, High Court, Bail, medical, negligence, Insurance claims/ accidents, Citizenship/ immigration, Consumer, district, state, national, Dowry, legal notice, summons, Tax: income, sales, custom, excise, Civil, criminal matter, Registration of property, title search, mutation relationship, Conveyance, transfer of property, deeds, drafts, power of attorney, Recovery.
